Answers.MP Summary: delay for a specified amount of time

au_403859: #!/bin/sh

(
    # This delay is required. Might be because the X server isn't
    # started yet.
    sleep 10

    # Set up a 5 minute timeout before powering off the display.
    xset dpms 0 0 300 
) &
